original_text: During the time when Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan and Jaddua were the leaders of the priests, they recorded the names of the Levites and the priests who were leaders of their clans. At the time when King Darius ruled Persia, they stopped doing this. During the time when Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan and Jaddua were the leaders of the priests, they recorded the names of the Levites and the priests who were leaders of their clans. At the time when King Darius ruled Persia, they stopped doing this.
korean_text: 엘리아십과 요야다와 요하난과 얏두아 때에 레위 사람의 족장이 모두 책에 기록되었고 바사 왕 다리오 때에 제사장도 책에 기록되었고

sentences.original_text: During the time when Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan and Jaddua were the leaders of the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리아십, 요야다, 요하난과 야두아가 제사장들의 지도자였을 때에

sentences.original_text: they recorded the names of the Levites
and the priests who were leaders of their clans
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 족속의 지도자였던 제사장들의 이름도

sentences.original_text: At the time when King Darius ruled Persia
